name: Trust & Will
description: RCU offer easy and affordable wills and estate planning. Highlights: - Family guardianship Designate guardians for your pets and minor children. - Health and legal docs Complete your documents – including power of attorney. - Minimize legal hassles Avoid probate (with a Trust-Based Estate Plan). - Enjoy peace of mind Give your loved ones peace of mind with an established plan. - Establish beneficiaries Select individuals to inherit specific assets as beneficiaries. - Reduce costs Advanced planni
